name: Super Cosmic Pest Control
description:
In Super Cosmic Pest Control, you travel the galaxy removing alien infestations from space stations. To do this, you deploy musical droids set to self-destruct, luring aliens with sweet tunes before blowing them up.

WSAD / arrows keys to move + SPACE to overheat faster.

I made this a while back and abandoned it before building the final few levels. Thought I'd upload it here to see if anyone reckons it's worth revisiting!
